availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Chambers T. Shaw (Brown County, Ohio, cooper)

body.p: Brown County, Ohio, cooper. Ohio native. Son of Sylvester Shaw and Elizabeth Shaw. Married to Mary E. Berry Shaw in Brown County on June 13, 1856. Father of Belle Shaw, William S. Shaw, Thomas Shaw. Cooper in Brown County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Ohio, Brown County, District No. 12, Russelville, Byrd Township, p. 19.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Ohio, Brown County, Ripley, p. 46.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Ohio, Brown County, The Village of Russellville Jefferson Township, p. 26.
Find A Grave, "Name (Birth-Death)," Memorial #11845137, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/11845137 (accessed February 28, 2019).
Ohio, County Marriage Records, Various Ohio County Courthouses, Brown County Marriages, Film #000384274, p. 196.
